headline.main: Sometimes the Problems Are Almost Beyond Belief

docs.abstract: article describes 2 cases helped through expert counseling of Brooklyn Catholic Charities and Brooklyn Bureau of Community Service, 2 agencies supported by NY Times Hundred Neediest Cases fund; drawing (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: For Mrs. R., the situation was devastating. Her youngest son, a 300-pound giant at the age of 11, struck an unintentional blow that killed his alcoholically debilitated father and had to be sent to a state hospital; another son suffered psychotic damage from LSD and other hallucinogens; the oldest son needed treatment for addiction to hard drugs.
